group.label: Header
group.comment:
IMPORTANT:
Width of the header columns is specified in grid units.
If you want to display three columns (Left Column, Central Column, Right Column) in a single row,
sum of these columns has to be equal 12 grid units, for example:
4 + 4 + 4, or 4 + 0 + 8, or 3 + 0 + 9, or 0 + 12 + 0.

field.label: Left Column
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Central Column
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Right Column
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Account Links
field.comment: Account Links block includes: 1. Magento's Top Links (links such as: Account, Wish List, Create an Account, Sign In etc.), 2. Additional optional custom links (content of built-in static block "block_header_top_links").

field.label: Include Top Links
field.comment: Disable to remove Top Links from the Account Links block.

field.label: Position of Additional Line Break
field.comment: E.g. add a line break after the cart drop-down to force other elements of the User Menu to be displayed in the new line (below the cart). Note that elements of the User Menu are aligned to the right edge of the header and are rendered in the following order: cart drop-down, "Compare" block, Top Links, custom static block.

field.label: Show Text Label "Cart"
field.comment: If set to "No", label "Cart" will be hidden in the Mini Cart drop-down block in the header. Note that in order to display Mini Cart drop-down block, option "Display Shopping Cart Sidebar" under System > Configuration > Checkout > Shopping Cart Sidebar has to be enabled.

field.label: Sticky Header
field.comment: If enabled, the main menu does not disappear when the user scrolls down the page.

field.label: Full Width Sticky Header
field.comment: If set to "Yes", content of the sticky header will be stretched to full width.

field.label: Show Logo in Sticky Header
field.comment: If set to "Yes", additional logo image will be displayed in the sticky header. Refer to the documentation for more details about the logo image.

field.label: Move Switchers Next To Logo
field.comment: If set to "Yes", language and currency switchers will be moved next to the logo (but only on small mobile devices - when browser viewport is narrower than 770 pixels) to make the header smaller.

field.label: Image Width
field.comment: Maximum width of the product image. If width is not specified, default width will be used (208 pixels). Remember that in the category view the visual size of the image depends on the number of columns. For example, if you increase the number of columns, columns will be narrower and there will be less space for the image in each column, so the visual size of the image will be smaller than the actual dimensions of the image.

field.label: Image Height
field.comment: Maximum height of the product image.

field.label: Alternative Image
field.comment: Show alternative image on mouse hover over the product image.

field.label: Select Alternative Image By Attribute
field.comment: Which attribute from product images will be used to select an alternative image.

field.label: Alternative Image Attribute Value
field.comment: Specify the attribute value which will mark alternative images of your products. E.g.: if Select Alternative Image By Attribute is set to "Sort Order", specify the number of product image which will mark the alternative image, for example: 2.

field.label: Number of Columns
field.comment:
Number of products displayed in a single row, if the value of Maximum Page Width is set to 1024 px.
Important: if the value of Maximum Page Width is bigger, the number of columns will be automatically increased to show more products in a row. For example: if the Number of Columns = 3 and the Maximum Page Width = 1280 px, then 4 products in a row will be displayed.

field.label: Number of Columns Below 768px
field.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 640 px and 768 px.

field.label: Number of Columns Below 640px
field.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 480px and 640 px.

field.label: Number of Columns Below 480px
field.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 320 px and 480 px. Below that width products are displayed in a single column.

field.label: Equal Height of Grid Items (Products)
field.comment: If enabled, all grid items have the same height and "Add to cart" button is displayed at the bottom edge of the item.

field.label: Product Hover Effect
field.comment:
Emphasize the product on mouse hover over the product.
Important: enable in order to use "Display On Hover" in Display Selected Elements. Otherwise displaying elements on mouse hover over the product will not work properly.

field.label: Disable Hover Effect Below...
field.comment: Product Hover Effect will be disabled if width of the browser viewport is below selected value.

field.label: Hide "Add to" Links Below...
field.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be hidden if width of the browser viewport is below selected value.

field.label: Align Center
field.comment: Align elements of the grid item to the center: product name, price, button etc.

field.label: Size of Elements
field.comment: Control size of the elements of the grid item: product name, button, product labels. If "Default" is selected, size of the elements will be automatically decreased if width of the browser viewport is below 768px.

field.label: Display Name in Single Line
field.comment: If set to "Yes": if product name is too long to be displayed in a single line, it will be clipped and an ellipsis ('…', U+2026 HORIZONTAL ELLIPSIS) will be appended at the end of the line to represent clipped text. This will only take effect if the option Name was set to "Display".

field.label: "Add to" Links
field.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links. Note: value "Display On Hover" will be applied only if the option Show "Add to" Links as Icons Above the Image was enabled.

field.label: Show "Add to" Links as Icons Above the Image
field.comment: If set to "Yes", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as simple icons above the product image.

field.label: Product Hover Effect
field.comment: Effect is visible on mouse hover over the product.

group.label: Layered Navigation
group.comment: In this section you can find some additional settings for the layered navigation block (the "Shop By" block). The basic settings for layered navigation can be found under Stores > Configuration > Catalog > Layered Navigation and Stores > Attributes > Products. All the details about the layered navigation can be found in Magento documentation.

field.label: Category Filter
field.comment: Se to "No" to remove Magento's category filter from the layered navigation block (the "Shop By" block). You may want to remove the category filter if the sidebar menu was enabled for category pages.

group.label: Product Page
group.comment:
IMPORTANT:
Width of the product page columns is specified in grid units.
If you want to display three main columns (Image Column, Primary Column, Secondary Column) in a single row,
sum of these three columns has to be equal 12 grid units (for example: 4 + 5 + 3).

field.label: Image Column Width
field.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

field.label: Primary Column Width
field.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

field.label: Secondary Column Width
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Lower Primary Column Width
field.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

field.label: Lower Secondary Column Width
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Collateral Data
field.comment: Container for product collateral data (displayed as tabs or vertically stacked blocks).

field.label: Position
field.comment: Position of Collateral Data container.

field.label: Display Collateral Data as Tabs
field.comment: Display Collateral Data container as simple tabs. If set to "No", Collateral Data will be displayed as vertically stacked blocks.

field.label: Position
field.comment: Position of related products block. Position will be ignored if option "Related Products in Collateral Data" was set to "Yes".

field.label: Breakpoints
field.comment:
With this parameter you can specify the number of products in a row visible with a particular browser viewport width. Use the following format (this is the default value):
[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 3], [768, 1]
More details about this parameter can be found in the user guide.
Leave empty to use the default value.

field.label: Timeout
field.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the slider, specify time (in milliseconds) between transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

field.label: Position
field.comment: Position of up-sell products block. Position will be ignored if option "Up-sell Products in Collateral Data" was set to "Yes".

field.label: Breakpoints
field.comment:
With this parameter you can specify the number of products in a row visible with a particular browser viewport width. Use the following format (this is the default value):
[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 3], [992, 4], [1200, 5]
More details about this parameter can be found in the user guide.
Leave empty to use the default value.

field.label: Timeout
field.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the slider, specify time (in milliseconds) between transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

field.label: Position
field.comment: Position of brand logo block.

field.label: Magnifier
field.comment: If enabled, magnifier block will be displayed at the right side of the main image on product page to zoom the currently selected image. Magnifier block will be displayed on mouse hover over the image.

field.label: Magnifier Width
field.comment: Width of the magnifier block. Enter value in pixels (do not enter "px" suffix).

field.label: Magnifier Height
field.comment: Height of the magnifier block. Enter value in pixels (do not enter "px" suffix).

field.label: Footer Links
field.comment: Disable to remove Footer Links (links such as: Contact Us, Advanced Search, Orders and Returns etc.) from the footer.

group.label: Product Sliders
group.comment: This section is related to all existing product sliders. "Timeout" will be applied only to Featured Products Slider and New Products Slider. "Timeout" for Related Products and Up-Sell Products (blocks on product page) can be set in Product Page tab.

field.label: Timeout
field.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the sliders, specify time (in milliseconds) between slide transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

field.label: Speed
field.comment: Duration (in milliseconds) of scrolling animation. Applied to scrolling with arrows (and touch swipe).

field.label: Automatic Scrolling Speed
field.comment: Duration (in milliseconds) of scrolling animation. Applied to automatic scrolling (if Timeout was specified) and to scrolling with pagination.

field.label: Pause on Hover
field.comment: If enabled, when the slider is mouseovered then the automatic scrolling will pause.

field.label: Loop
field.comment: If enabled, scrolling will loop.

field.label: Lazy Loading
field.comment: Delays loading of images. If enabled, images outside of viewport will not be loaded before user scrolls to them.

field.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
field.comment: Set "Yes", to keep aspect ratio of product images (height of each image will be calculated automatically based on width). If set to "No", Magento will automatically transform each image into square. If the original image was rectangular, the empty space at the sides will be filled with white color.

field.label: Import Static Blocks and Pages From Selected Demo
Import From Demo
field.comment:
Before importing, select the demo from which you want to import and then immediately save the configuration (click the "Save Config" button). Without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the admin page.
IMPORTANT:
in case you need the original content of some static blocks or pages
XML files with all static blocks and pages can be found in the following directory:
app/code/Infortis/Base/etc/importexport/cms/

field.label: Static Blocks
field.comment: Click this button to import static blocks.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
field.comment: If set to "Yes", imported blocks will overwrite existing blocks with the same identifiers (if any blocks with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

field.label: Pages
field.comment: Click this button to import CMS pages.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
field.comment: If set to "Yes", imported pages will overwrite existing pages with the same identifiers (if any pages with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

group.label: Colors
group.comment: In this tab, you can configure basic colors. Settings from this tab are inherited by all the other sections. Some of the settings (such as text color) can be overridden in other sections.

field.label: Important Button - Active Background Color
field.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

field.label: Important Button - Active Text Color
field.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, i.e. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout".

field.label: Interface Icons
field.comment: Selected interface icons, e.g.: slider arrows, category view toolbar icons.

field.label: Iconbox
field.comment: Icon with background color (icon with the "ib" class).

field.label: Iconbox (Social Icons)
field.comment: Iconbox wrapped inside a container with the "social-links" class.

field.label: Banners
field.comment: Banners with image, caption and hover effects.

field.label: Caption Color
field.comment: Background color of an element with the "cap" class inside a banner.

field.label: Horizontal Links
field.comment: Links inside an unordered list with the "links" class.

field.label: Additional Background Color
field.comment: It should be slightly darker or lighter than the main background color of the page. It will be used to emphasize some elements and blocks on the page, e.g. summary on cart page and checkout page.

field.label: Basic Font Size
field.comment: Size of the regular text. Font size of most of the other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

field.label: Heading Font Family
field.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

field.label: Custom
field.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif.
Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

field.label: Google Fonts
field.comment:
Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts
Important: most of the fonts from Google are not available in all weights. Make sure that you specified correct weight (field Font Weight below) for selected font. Otherwise font will not be displayed. Refer to Google Web Fonts to check if the selected weight is available for your font.

field.label: Character Sets
field.comment:
Some of the fonts support multiple scripts (like Latin and Cyrillic for example). You need to select at least one character set.
Important: not all fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets refer to Google Web Fonts.
Important: using multiple character sets affects performance, so only select the character sets that you actually need.

field.label: Font Weight
field.comment:
Specify the weight of the font. You can only use numeric font weights which are available for the CSS property font-weight. E.g. normal weight is 400, bold is 700. Leave empty to use default weight.
Important: if you selected a font from Google Fonts, note that some fonts are not available in all weights. Refer to Google Web Fonts to check if the selected weight is available for your font.

field.label: Content Area Shadow
field.comment: If enabled, all sections with nontransparent Inner Background Color, will drop shadow.

field.label: Main Menu Shadow
field.comment: Select which container of the menu will drop shadow. Important: unlike other sections, menu doesn't need to have Inner Background Color to drop shadow.

field.label: Structural Elements Transition
field.comment: If enabled, main structural elements of the page layout will be animated during web browser window resizing.

field.label: Page Background Color
field.comment: Background color applied for all sections of the page: header, main content area and footer

field.label: Side Padding
field.comment: Add padding to the left and right side of inner container of all sections of the page. Specify value in pixels. Leave empty to use default value (15). Recommended value: not less than 15.

group.label: Header
group.comment: In this tab, you can configure the header section of the page located at the very top.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above the header section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below the header section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Maximum Width
field.comment:
Use to decrease the maximum width of the search box. It works similar to CSS property max-width. Example values: 200px, 75%, 10em. Leave empty to use the default width.
Important: don't forget to specify the unit.

field.label: Product Counter Color
field.comment: Small box showing number of products added to the cart.

field.label: Line Height
field.comment: Minimum height of line of text. It works similar to CSS property line-height.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Top Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Side Padding
field.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

field.label: Elements
field.comment: Style of elements: Mini Cart drop-down, Mini Compare drop-down, account links.

field.label: Line Height
field.comment: Minimum height of line of text. It works similar to CSS property line-height.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Top Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Side Padding
field.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Side Padding
field.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

field.label: Mobile header tabs
field.comment: Buttons (i.e. menu, search, account, cart) displayed in mobile header.

field.label: Background Color
field.comment: Background color of the entire menu container, as wide as the widht of the browser viewport.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above the menu bar. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below the menu bar. Value in pixels.

field.label: Inner Background Color (Outline)
field.comment:
Background color of the inner container. Set this color to display an outline around the menu bar.
Note: if option Remove Content Side Padding is enabled, the outline will not be visible because menu bar will cover the inner container.

field.label: Top Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Side Padding
field.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

field.label: Height
field.comment: Specify height of the top-level menu item.

field.label: Bottom Border Width
field.comment: Specify width of the border at the bottom of the menu bar. Leave empty to remove border.

field.label: Show Bottom Border
field.comment: If the border at the bottom of the menu bar was enabled, set this option to "No" to hide that border in the sticky menu.

field.label: Drop-down Item Font Size
field.comment: Font size of the menu items on all levels inside drop-downs.

field.label: Mega Drop-Down - Font Settings
field.comment: Additional font settings for menu items inside drop-downs configured as "Mega drop-down".

field.label: Mobile Menu - Font Settings
field.comment: Additional font settings for the mobile menu.

field.label: Drop-down Shadow
field.comment: If set to "Yes", drop-down boxes will drop shadow.

field.label: Top Border Width
field.comment: Specify width of the border at the top of the drop-down boxes. Leave empty to remove border.

field.label: Apply Border To All Levels
field.comment: If set to "No", only drop-down boxes of the top-level categories will have the border.

field.label: Link Separator Color
field.comment: Vertical space between links in mobile version of the main menu. Leave empty to remove separator.

field.label: Mobile Menu Drop-down Shadow
field.comment: If set to "Yes", mobile menu drop-down box will drop shadow if category contains any category blocks.

field.label: Vertical Menu
field.comment: Colors of: 1. the sidebar menu, 2. the top menu displayed as a vertical drop-down menu (when "Vertical Drop-down Menu" is enabled in menu settings).

field.label: Height
field.comment: Height of the vertical menu item.

field.label: Top Menu - Vertical Drop-down Menu
field.comment: The top menu displayed as a vertical drop-down menu (when "Vertical Drop-down Menu" option is enabled in menu settings).

field.label: Display Shadow Of Vertical Drop-down Menu
field.comment: If set to "Yes", the vertical drop-down will drop shadow. Note that this option does not affect the drop-down boxes of categories inside the menu.

group.label: Main
group.comment: In this tab, you can configure the main content area - section of the page located between the header and the footer.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above the main section of the page. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below the main section of the page. Value in pixels.

field.label: Top Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Side Padding
field.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

group.label: Footer
group.comment: In this tab, you can configure the footer section of the page located at the bottom. Settings from this tab are inherited by all the other sub-sections of the footer. Some of the settings can be overridden in sub-sections.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the footer. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the footer. Value in pixels.

field.label: Top Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Side Padding

- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

field.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the footer. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding

group.label: Category View
group.comment: In this tab, you can configure category view.

group.label: Product Page
group.comment: In this tab, you can configure product view.

group.label: Slideshow
group.comment: In this tab, you can configure elements related to slideshows.

field.label: Interface Icons
field.comment: Slider arrows and pagination.

field.label: Icon Active Background Color
field.comment: Active pagination button. Note: not all styles of pagination use "active state" color.

field.label: Custom Maximum Page Width (px)
field.comment: Specify value in pixels, do not add "px" suffix.
